pages.text: This is the Refined Diamond. its properties are better then regular diamond. Lets see how to make it! $(br2)First you have to sand a gem down with some grit paper. $(br)Then combine it with some refining dust.
Now that you have the Refined Diamond Dust, you have to make it into an unfired gem.
After you have the unfired gem you have to smelt that to get the Refined Diamondt! $(br2) Note: You can also smelt it in a blasting furnace!
